isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 46
for Items in parentheses.

The cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) consists of the window regulator assembly (Item 2), front window run channel (Item 3), rear window run channel (Item 4), inner cab door handle (Item 5), outer cab door handle (Item 6) and door latch assembly (Item 7). This assembly is installed and removed as a module, driver side shown.

Refer to Figure 47
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para:
Position cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 3) at the cab door (Item 4). While holding cab door modular door hardware assembly away from cab door, connect wiring harness connector (Item 6) into connector of door latch assembly (Item 7), driver side shown. Inner cab door handle (Item 5, Figure 46)
removed for clarity.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 46
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide the top of the front and rear window run channels (Items 3 and 4) of the cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) up inside cab door (Item 9), driver side shown.

While holding cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) with the top of the front and rear window run channels (Items 3 and 4) inside cab door (Item 9), position door latch assembly (Item 7) and outer cab door handle (Item 6) of the cab door modular door hardware assembly inside cab door and slide it to the left.
Install mounting guide pin (Item 14) on the right end of the cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) into mounting guide pin hole (Item 15) in the cab door (Item 9), driver side shown.
Align mounting holes on left end of cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) with mounting holes on cab door and install two torx head bolt (Item 13) finger tight, driver side shown.

Install two torx head bolts (Item 13) through mounting holes on right end of cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) into the weld nuts in the cab door (Item 9), driver side shown. Tighten the four torx head bolts (Item 13) to 8 to 10 Lbf-ft (10.8 to 13.6 N•m).

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 47
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para:
Once the cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 3) is secured to the cab door (Item 4), install wiring harness push-in fasteners four places (Item 5) into mounting holes of cab door modular door hardware assembly. Connect wiring harness connector (Item 1) into the connector of the electric window motor (Item 2), driver side shown. Inner door handle (Item 5, Figure 46)
removed for clarity.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 46
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Reach through cab door access opening and position door latch assembly (Item 7) on cab door (Item 9) and install three torx head bolts (Item 8), driver side shown. Tighten to 8 to 10 Lbf-ft (10.8 to 13.6 N•m).

Reach through cab door access opening and position outer cab door handle (Item 6) on cab door (Item 9) and install four torx pan head screws (Item 12), driver side shown. Tighten to 35 to 44 Lbf-in (4 to 5 N•m).

note.para: A new outer cab door handle trim bezel (Item 11) will need to be installed if the plastic tabs securing it to the cab door, broke off during removal.

step1.para: Position four plastic tabs of the outer cab door handle trim bezel (Item 11) into mounting holes in the outer cab door handle (Item 6) and carefully push it in place to secure it , driver side shown.

Once the cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) has been secured in the cab door (Item 9). Make sure the door lock, inner cab door handle (Item 5), outer cab door handle (Item 6) and door latch assembly (Item 7) are working properly before proceeding.

Install cab door glass, refer to
CAB DOOR GLASS
. For installing cab door glass, refer to Install Cab Door Glass with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Install cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. For installing cab door vapor barrier, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door modular door hardware assembly with electric door window and locks.
